objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver Craftsmanship
• Elegant Pink Drop Design
• Certificate of Authenticity

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner features a luxury jewelry product with a soft, feminine design approach. It is split into two vertical halves: the left side presents textual details, while the right side showcases a detailed image of the product. The background uses a gentle duotone gradient—light pink on the left, transitioning into a slightly deeper pink on the right—with curved faint wave lines and scattered dots adding subtle depth.

The central message is delivered through the bold heading (`heading`) and an elegant serif subheading (`subheading`). Supporting product specifications are clearly listed in bullet format (`description`). A striking price highlight (`price`) is followed by a call-to-action button (`cta`) on a solid colored rectangle (`cta_background`). Below, a rating section (`rating`) and soft promotional tagline (`tagline`) reinforce trust and appeal. A vivid jewelry image (`product_image`) sits prominently on the right, drawing visual focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Rose (#FFF5F5)
- Warm Blush (#FFD7D7)
- Blush Pink (#FFB8B8)
- Plum Wine (#7D3C4A)
- Dusty Rose (#D77A8B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a pair of elegant earrings designed with a delicate blend of blush pink and brilliant white tones. The rose gold metal base (#F4A1A1) forms the structural frame, adding a soft metallic warmth. The blush pink enamel (#F8C6C6) on the floral motif adds femininity, contrasted beautifully with the sparkling white crystals (#FFFFFF) that provide a luxurious, eye-catching brilliance. The elongated marquise-cut elements introduce a hint of silvery shimmer (#EDEDED), blending seamlessly with the pale background. A perfect advertisement color palette would include #F4A1A1, #F8C6C6, #FFFFFF, and #EDEDED, emphasizing elegance, sophistication, and modern femininity.
